mapper.select: select fr.fertilization_record_id, fr.batch_id, fr.fertilization_rate, fr.fertilization_time, fr.operate_person, fr.record_person, fr.record_time, fr.gmt_create, fr.gmt_modified, bi.batch_name, ubi.name as recordPersonName, ubi2.name as operatePersonName from fertilization_record fr join batch_info bi on fr.batch_id = bi.batch_id join user_basic_info ubi on ubi.user_basic_info_id = fr.record_person join user_basic_info ubi2 on ubi2.user_basic_info_id = fr.operate_person;
